hadiths.text: Abu Tufail reported; I. said to Ibn 'Abbas (Allah be pleased with them):I think that I saw Allah's Messenger (ﷺ). He (Ibn 'Abbis) said' Give a description of him to me. I said: I saw him near al-Marwa on the back of a she- camel, and people had thronged around him. Thereupon Ibn'Abbis said: It was Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) for they (the Compainions of the Holy Prophet) were neither pushed aside from him, nor were they turned away

chapter.ara-name: باب اسْتِحْبَابِ الرَّمَلِ فِي الطَّوَافِ وَالْعُمْرَةِ وَفِي الطَّوَافِ الأَوَّلِ فِي الْحَجِّ
chapter.eng-name: Raml (walking rapidly) is recommended in the Tawaf of Umrah, and in the first Tawaf of Hajj
